summary_detail.value: September 1, 2017, 7 A.M.Contact: John HamiltonPhone: 406-826-4345 or 406-529-5475 Inciweb: https://inciweb.nwcg.gov/incident/5558/  What: Sheep Gap and Deep Creek Fire Update Location: Sheep Gap fire is approximately 9 miles west of Plains, Plains-Thompson Falls Ranger District (T 20 North R 27 W Section 7); Deep Creek fire is approximately 12 miles northwest of Thompson Falls (T 23 North R 30 W Section 14) Size: Approximately 1,637 acres Containment: 0 Cause: Started by lightning August 29  The Sheep Gap and Deep Creek fires: Both fires were started by lightning earlier this week. A Type 3 organization was assigned management of the Deep Creek fire as well as the Sheep Gap fire as of this morning, September 1. The primary initial attack priorities on both fast-growing incidents is to first secure identified high-value resources while attempting to control these fires. Helicopters with buckets, heavy air tankers and single engine air tankers were utilized when available throughout...

title: 09-01-2017_Sheep Gap Fire Update (Sheep Gap Wildfire)
